==Profile==
Pharez is a [[Sumeru Akademiya]] student from the [[Kshahrewar]] Darshan. Despite belonging to separate Darshans, they collaborate with [[Amurta]] student [[Yasmin]] and [[Spantamad]] student [[Ladep]] to study the health of [[Sumeru City]]'s [[Divine Tree]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Great Tree: Rooted State}}</ref>
